snippet.title: The Eternal Life of Goldman | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Eternal Life of Goldman is a vibrant yet dark platformer adventure that weaves together legends, fairy tales and myths. Explore a vast hand-drawn Archipelago, inspired by ancient fables and depicted in classic frame-by-frame animation, and defeat a mysterious Deity! 

The Eternal Life of Goldman is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S! 

 
- Links & Info -  
Steam: https://thqn.net/TELoG-steam
Xbox: https://thqn.net/TELoG-Xbox
PlayStation: https://thqn.net/TELoG-psn

- Our Socials -  
YouTube: youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: twitter.com/thqnordic 
Facebook: facebook.com/thqnordic 
Instagram: instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: twitch.tv/thqnordic
Threads: threads.net/@thqnordic

#TheEternalLifeOfGoldman #THQNordic2024
